phrases: I am going to return to the hometown we lost.
That is all I care about now.
I chose to be a soldier in the hopes of joining the Military Police
so I could work in the safety of the interior.
Why do you want to be a soldier?
I decided I have to kill them.
I decided I have to slaughter all the Titans...
So your encounter with the Titans did not break your will?
You will be able to do it.
If only I would cut off their heads!
I should have been able to do it, so why?!
There will not be another chance!
Everyone, jump away from the wall!
We are taking down the Colossal Titan!
It is a threat to all of humanity!
Just like the reports said, he is slow!
It might be big, but that is it!
Compared to the Titans we normally fight, this will be easy!
He is trying to disappear again?
The last time he vanished instantly,
but now, he is maintaining his form and emitting heat like a furnace.
If he keeps protecting himself with steam...
We are unable to attack him with ODM gear!
Squads three and four, take position behind the target.
It is yet to be seen how long he can keep his body burning, but...
We wait for that moment to attack.
Armin... and squad one follow me!
We have got a date with the Armored Titan!
And take care of those two injured soldiers.
Ymir cannot possibly be dead yet.
They do not have their ODM gear either!
Please, go find and help those two!
And here you would not shut up about a soldier's duty...
During close combat training, were you always holding back on me?
You are so strong, it is ridiculous.
I cannot even move an inch of my body.
I always thought you were a stand-up guy.
Someone who remained calm, regardless of the situation...
A guy who put your comrades ahead of yourself...
To think at one time I wished... to be as strong as you someday.
And my blades do not work either?!
What is worse, unlike Annie, his whole body is hard!
I do not know what kind of face you are making right now, but...
You really are the worst pieces of shit.
I bet in the history of mankind, nobody's done anything as terrible as you.
I have got to erase you.
You should not be allowed to exist anymore.
What the hell are you thinking?
I have never felt so revolted before.
Just remembering you and your self-righteous face is making me sick.
It makes me want to vomit.
It is time to exterminate you!
Information Available for Public Disclosure Titan Martial Arts
Though not typically an impressive exhibition of power and size, martial arts is similarly effective for Titans as it is for humans.
Grappling holds and throws used against a Titan opponent are sometimes more potent than a striking blow.
Have not you ever heard the concept of pulling your punches?
I did it because you are coming at me full-force.
I have got to respond with equal strength of my own.
And if you are a guy...
Your jokes are not funny at all.
If strength is the deciding factor, then why am I on my ass and you are still standing?
I did not throw you using my strength.
It is a technique used to protect yourself against an opponent stronger than you.
If I were you, I would think about learning it.
Why do not we take a break?
Try to learn something first before you surrender.
Learn how to use your strength and the proper way to speak to women!
I promise I will learn, so let go already!
Do you want to learn that badly?
Why the hell did Reiner come flying this way?
I want to learn that move, too.
That move is meant to be used against humans, so I do not think you have any use for it.
I am interested to see if it works...
I bet my whole dinner on Mikasa!
How did that turn out in the end?
Why am I remembering it now?
Is this what they call having your life flash before your eyes?
Actually, who gives a shit anymore?
I do not think I have felt... this awful in my whole life.
You cannot win in a slugfest!
Do not try to fight him!
I do not know what the hell you guys are trying to accomplish by doing all this, but...
Now that I think of it, your plan has been full of flaws from the start!
You should have thought twice about teaching me how to fight!
You are not getting away from this!
Their goal is to kidnap and take you away!
We have got to escape and prevent that from happening!
But, Armin, Reiner is not going to let us do as we please!
He is back in control again.
Yeah, but like you were saying,
it will be almost impossible to escape Reiner.
I knew it... The Colossal Titan.
Why did that bastard show up here?!
Eren and the others are that way!
If you are going to escape, we have got to find a way to halt Reiner
Can you break his leg with another one of those joint locks?
Our blades do not seem to work on him,
so use your head and figure out the best course of action!
It is the rest of my blades.
This time, running away is a guaranteed victory.
It is you guys that are screwed for revealing what you are.
You are the ones backed into a corner.
Do not stay on the ground!
His tackle is too much to handle!
Since when could he move so quick?
If his entire body was hard like stone, there is no way he could move like that.
In the armor they used in wars of the past,
it had sections at the joints not covered in metal to allow for movement.
Like at the armpits and groin...
And also... the spot behind the knee.
Since I will get knocked over anyways...
Now it is a battle of strength!
He cannot fight back as much anymore!
Tear the head off his neck!
No other Titans spotted in the area!
Try screaming for help with your head ripped off, you idiot!
Look, he is tearing it off!
What is with the Armored Titan?
Why did he scream like that?
The battle between Eren and the Armored Titan comes to an abrupt conclusion.
With its fall from the wall,
Mikasa is injured by the Colossal Titan and Hannes comes running to her side.
To protect Eren through his reckless behavior... to stand proudly at his side...
